scout.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: an organization for boys that teaches them practical skills
scout.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a boy who is a member of this organization
scout.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a girl who is a member of an organization for girls that teaches them practical things
scout.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: a soldier, plane etc that is sent to search the area in front of an army and get information about the enemy
scout.translation[0].definitions[3].exam: He sent three scouts ahead to take a look at the bridge.
scout.translation[0].definitions[4].defi: someone whose job is to look for good sports players, musicians etc in order to employ them
scout.translation[0].definitions[4].exam: He was spotted by a scout at the age of 13.
scout.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to look for something in a particular area
scout.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Iâ€™m scouting round for a place to stay.
scout.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: to examine a place or area in order to get information about it
scout.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: American companies are keen to scout out business opportunities in Vietnam.
scout.translation[1].definitions[2].defi: to find out about the abilities of sports players, musicians etc in order to employ them
